title: README overhaul with badges, screenshots, and quick start
description:
Transform README.md into an impressive open source landing page.

**Must include:**
- Project logo/banner
- Badges (build status, npm version, license, PRs welcome)
- Animated GIF or screenshot showing the plugin in action
- One-liner description
- Feature highlights with icons
- Quick start guide (< 5 minutes to running)
- Links to detailed docs
- "Why Moe?" section explaining the value prop
- Comparison table vs alternatives (if any)
definitionOfDone: Screenshot or GIF of plugin UI
Quick start works on all platforms
taskRails: Must render well on GitHub and npm

implementationPlan.description: Create/find project logo or banner image. Add to assets/ or docs/images/ folder. Size: 800x200px recommended.
Add badges section: build status (placeholder until CI), npm version, license, PRs welcome. Use shields.io format.
Write compelling intro: one-liner tagline, 2-3 sentence description, 'Why Moe?' value proposition section
Add feature highlights with icons/emojis: Human oversight, Multi-agent support, IDE integration, MCP protocol
Write Quick Start section: Prerequisites, Installation (3 steps max), First run, link to full docs
Add Architecture section with mermaid diagram showing plugin <-> daemon <-> CLI flow
Add Contributing, License, and Links sections at bottom
